
# Function


## ```js cursorPos ```


Return the terminal cursor position in {x,y} format.



## Example (js)

```js
const cursorPos = require('@coffeekraken/sugar/node/terminal/cursorPos');
await cursorPos(); // => { x: 10, y: 20 }
```
